Entry.JapaneseText: キュリア先生のところへ寄ったってコトは、 クレアさんは、病気だったのかな……？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if Claire had to see Dr. Curia because she was feeling sick?
Ah, I was just using that as an example...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……本当に大丈夫なのか、クレアは……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm really wondering if Claire is doing all right...

Entry.JapaneseText: 悪く考えると、物事は悪い方へ進んでいくものだ。 クレアさんは元気でいる……そう信じるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Think negative and negative things will happen. You need to believe that Claire is in good health.
